short_description: NON-CONTACT & 1 SECOND READING - This non-contact thermometer uses infrared technology. When measuring temperature (such as forehead temperature), there is no need to touch the forehead, and the accurate measurement results can be obtained in just 1 second.

MULTI-MODE & MULTI-FUNCTION - Our thermometer can not only measure the temperature of the forehead/ears of adults and children, but also the temperature of rooms/objects (such as milk). It also supports switching between Celsius and Fahrenheit.

SMART FEVER ALARM - With the support of smart chips, our thermometer can warn of fever. When the temperature is higher than the normal range, the short beep will sound and the backlight of the screen will turn orange/red for a low/high fever alarm.

HD BACKLIT LCD SCREEN & MUTE MODE - HD backlight LCD screen allows you to read clearly in the dark. You can also switch to silent mode, which is convenient for you to track your baby's body temperature changes after your baby falls asleep.

product_description: Get clinically validated accuracy from the No. 1 brand recommended by pediatricians. The Braun ThermoScan®️ 5 Ear thermometer’s infrared technology provides temperature results in seconds. Its intuitive design comes with a pre-warmed tip for improved accuracy, and our user-friendly ExacTemp®️ Stability Indicator confirms when the device is stable in the ear with a light and a beep. Built-in memory function recalls the last nine temperatures measured, and it includes 21 Hygiene Caps to help keep the lens clean and prevent obstructions. It comes ready to use with 2AA batteries and a proactive cradle/cap for storage. It’s gentle enough for babies. Safe and easy to use on the entire family. Disclaimers: 1) Based on survey reporting that of surveyed pediatricians who recommend a brand of thermometers, Braun is the most recommended. 2) Loveys AA, Dutko-Fioravanti I, Eberly SW, Powell, KR. Infrared tympanic thermometry in comparison with other temperature measurement techniques in febrile children. Pediatric Care Med. 2006;7(1):48-55. (3) As eardrum shares the same blood supply with the brain’s temperature control center, the hypothalamus.) - Netter FH, Atlas of Human Anatomy. product_description: When checking for a fever at home, you want accurate and reliable results, quickly. The Braun No Touch + Forehead Thermometer delivers. This non-contact forehead thermometer provides clinically accurate readings without waking your child up, and can also be used as a no touch thermometer for adults, babies, toddlers and children. Plus, it’s also able to be used as a traditional, touch forehead thermometer. It’s easy to use this touch free thermometer. The on-screen positioning system confirms proper distance, and guidance light directs for accurate aiming. The color-coded display will glow green, yellow or red to present the temperature reading. Plus, it’s a great choice for a non-invasive thermometer for the entire family. It can be used as a Fahrenheit thermometer, but also provides Celsius readings. The color coded temperature guidance helps get readings at a glance, and understand them easily. A green display suggests a normal temperature, yellow signifies an elevated temperature and a red display indicates a high temperature.
